TopicTitle: So jeb says "pull on this lever"...oh dear

Articles.Content: Love this game...where would I find info on the plans for the Kerbals...I mean...the personality, carrier, profiles. what I would like to see is a mission log attached to each kerbal. even thought there is no prema death. could there be a story line...as I'm new I am sure this has been covered...just point me to the relevant info and I shall leave you all to it....oh and about making corporations will that be integrated in to the game somehow? (or just web based enjoyment?) thx! happy landings

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Planned_features

That's a list of planned features.

Your looking a little too far ahead, but yes what you said is slowly, but surely being implemented. And only Bob, Bill and Jeb are immortal ( can be changed ). The others stay dead. But yes I would love to see features that made the player more attached to the individual kerbal. Hiring them, training them and then having them earn experience and medals. And even ranks would be cool. Different space suits for each one.

And then customizing kerbals... After Jeb returns from the Mun for instance I'd love to unlock some aviators for him to wear lol. In due time..

Edited December 7, 2013 by Motokid600
